summary: A recent study has revealed that temporary sporting event structures contribute significantly to local landfill waste, prompting calls for more sustainable building practices.
Two beloved reality TV stars celebrated their wedding in a historic countryside estate, attended by a small group of close friends and family.
Volunteers in a suburban neighborhood have come together to refurbish a dilapidated baseball field, making it suitable for youth league games and practices.
A leading influencer has faced significant backlash for spreading misinformation about a recent health trend on their platform.
An up-and-coming soccer star has decided to retire prematurely to pursue a degree in engineering, marking a significant shift from professional sports to academia.
An influential musician has announced their involvement in a new fitness campaign, aimed at encouraging fans to incorporate daily exercise into their routines.
